title: Can't play game -LOLClient.exe has stopped Working
body:
The computer keep tell me LOlclient.exe has stopped working 
Like the picture
Please some one help me .tell me what should i can do 
thank you
 {{champion:64}}

replies.body: This has been fixed, please try this again and let me know if you still have issues.

Might want to say that on [this discussion](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/qGggBnHi-lol-client-crash-may-22nd).

Edit: He just changed it, lol.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=eqAiF5VA,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-05-22T07:14:55.100+0000)
>
> Might want to say that on [this discussion](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/qGggBnHi-lol-client-crash-may-22nd).
> 
> Edit: He just changed it, lol.

I changed it for him :P

> [{quoted}](name=em0rhc,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=eqAiF5VA,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-22T07:33:37.016+0000)
>
> CARE TO REPLY RIOT M8

If you crashed due to this bug, I am sorry, but it seems to be related to those going from the store to the home page. I can't reverse your promos and hope you have a stable experience going forward.

> [{quoted}](name=em0rhc,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=eqAiF5VA,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-22T07:33:37.016+0000)
>
> CARE TO REPLY RIOT M8


> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cochese,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=eqAiF5VA,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-22T07:39:38.651+0000)
>
> If you crashed due to this bug, I am sorry, but it seems to be related to those going from the store to the home page. I can't reverse your promos and hope you have a stable experience going forward.

Totally rekt

report issue 

dear Riot Cochese 

thanks for your support .I start play 1 hour already it's work good .
any problem I will report you .
thank you for make my dream come true .

best regard 
Greenmango Thailand
can I get my promos back? ye?
It's heart you know when you waiting to play all week .when the time come but you can't play it
